favourite.article: In this day we live, looking for Jesus, or Blessed Hope to come again, we truly need the holy Word of God to light our earthly path!
The word of God is given to us free, and is a sword for us to use. Meditating daily on it make us strong and proper!! Thanks for this wonderful song!!!

The children here in Boca Raton (of all ages) love singing this song because we all take turns popping up like popcorn while spelling out B-I-B-L-E in this song! Try it sometime with your little ones!!
Nice! I like the tune and content. It's easy to remember. Thank the Lord for the B-I-B-L-E!
Praise the Lord that we have the Bible: a supply for our spiritual needs. We can praise Him, sing by Him and walk by Him. Amen, Amen, Amen. Praise the Lord!
The Bible is a complete book that brings solution to all problems. Praise God for this.
Amen. Praise the Lord even singing hymn and spiritual songs we can enjoy the Lord.
No one can describe how we feel in reading the Bible because this is more than any book that we have in this world. We are reading the very Word of God. Amen.
Amen! Thank You Lord for the Bible. You are our true food that we may live. Hallelujah!
